it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file

Class UnZipper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file.UnZipper

  • public final class UnZipper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide the common method to unzip a .zip file. How to use: 
    
 File src = new File("~/path/to/zip/arch.zip");
 File dst = new File("~/");
 UnZipper unzip = new UnZipper( src, dst );
 System.out.println( unzip.listZipContent() ); //(To ONLY view the zip content)
 unzip.unZip(); //(To unzip all the content)

      UnZipper(java.io.File zip, java.io.File dstFolder)
      Instance the UnZipper object to unzip all the content into destination folder given.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnZipper

        public UnZipper(java.io.File zip,
                java.io.File dstFolder)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                java.io.IOException
        Instance the UnZipper object to unzip all the content into destination folder given.
        Parameters:
        zip - File the zip source file.
        dstFolder - File the destination folder to unzip all the content.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument given are null.
        java.io.IOException - if into destination folder given can be written the zip content.

    • Method Detail

      • listZipContent

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> listZipContent()
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method list all the zip content.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of zip content as File
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it incurred a problem while opening the zip file.

      • unZipAll

        public java.util.List<java.io.File> unZipAll(boolean skipIfExists)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method unzip all the zip content into the destination folder given. Pass true as argument if you want to skip the file if it's already exists into destination folder, otherwise it will be rewritten.
        Parameters:
        skipIfExists - Boolean true to skip the file if already exists, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        List of File that are unzipped into destination folder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it incurred a problem while extracts files.

      • unZipSelective

        public java.util.List<java.io.File> unZipSelective(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstFilesToUnzip)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method extract from zip all the file that are into the list of String given. The string inside the list must be exactly the same as the name of file into the zip, otherwise this method will skip it.
        Parameters:
        lstFilesToUnzip - List of String to match with the name of file inside the zip. if null this method returns null.
        Returns:
        List of file extracted in this way.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it incurred a problem while extract files.

      • getSourceZipFile

        public java.io.File getSourceZipFile()
        Returns:
        File the source zip file.

        public java.io.File getDestinationFolder()

      • getContent

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> getContent()
        Returns:
        ArrayList of File that are the zip content.
